description: Update all 4 dev tools generators (Roster, FA Pool, Draft Class, Full New Game) to align with FINALS design documents. Ensure traits, badges, contracts, and all generation logic matches the finalized specifications.
goal: Align existing generators with FINALS docs and add missing features
requirements: FA Pool Generator aligns with FINAL-free-agent-pool-system.md
Draft Class Generator aligns with FINAL-draft-class-system.md
Player generation uses all 70 archetypes from FINAL-player-generation-system.md
Badge system matches FINAL-badge-system.md (43 badges, 4 tiers)
Full New Game Generator combines all systems correctly
constraints: Must work with existing Player type in src/lib/types.ts
Must not break existing dev tools UI
Generators must remain testable in isolation
